attributes.additional_details: Hi everyone i qould like to get the goverment to build some fitness parks which contain dip bars pull up bars rings sloped ab bench monkey bars to train calisthenics i live in Leeds and theres nothing but kids parks and thing perants are not happy when they see a group of lads working out in a park so we need our own area it be easy enough to draw up a diagram of the park and the main thing is to get people involed in fitness its free and fun and as i keep hearing about olimpics and encouraging people to get up and try something new this is good to strat with . for people who not sure what this is youtube calisthenics , street workout , Hannibal for king or Hit richards then you will see please help

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
